title: Historical Artifacts
description: Artifacts Client is a modern, responsive web application built with React 19 and Vite that allows users to explore, like, and learn about historical artifacts from around the world.

title: Collaborative Hobby-Hub
description: HobbyHub, a creative community platform for hobbyists! This is the frontend of the project, built with React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and DaisyUI for blazing-fast performance and beautiful design.
techStack: Tailwind CSS, React, Express, MongoDB, Firebase, JWT ,Stripe js
limitations: No push notification support for new deals
